summary.para: Gets the initialization flags associated with the deferred context that created the command list.

returns.para: The context flag is reserved for future use and is always 0.

remarks.para: The GetContextFlags method gets the flags that were supplied to the ContextFlags parameter of ; however, the context flag is reserved for future use.

summary.para: The ID3D11CommandList interface encapsulates a list of graphics commands for play back.

remarks.para: There is no explicit creation method, simply declare an ID3D11CommandList interface, then call to record commands or to play back commands.
